h1_title: Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough
content: If you take the path left after crossing the bridge, you'll find that it leads along the main path where you can find a Tree Pearl, and nearby another tree will spring to life!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_4_Secret-Purple_Cloud_Mountain_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley of Blooms'.
The content is as follows:
If you take the path left after crossing the bridge, you'll find that it leads along the main path where you can find a Tree Pearl, and nearby another tree will spring to life!
